summary.title: Summary
text: Self-driven HR Manager/People Partner with 3+ years of experience in human resources and technical recruiting both in outsourcing/outstaffing companies and recruitment agency. Have experience of HR/recruitment practices design and implementation from scratch, as well as operational processes improvement. For the last 2 years, I have been working mostly as People Partner combining business goals with people management and now I am assured this is my true passion :)

content.subtitle: Mobilunity | Kyiv
text: Providing a full scope of HR practices (onboarding and offboarding, probation period control, adaptation, motivation, retention, employer branding, regular one-to-one meetings, organization of corporate events, internal communications, compensations and benefits, employees assessments, salary reviews, procedures and policies implementation, etc.);
Advising and supporting TOP stakeholders on people management issues;
HR initiatives and projects design and implementation from scratch (performance management, eNPS surveys, new internal processes for remote work, employees absence management, etc.);

text: Providing full life cycle recruiting process (preparing, sourcing, screening, selecting, hiring, onboarding);

Close cooperation with HRD to support and improve all HR practices as People Partner (adaptation, motivation, retention, employer branding, one-to-one meetings, exit interviews, organization of corporate events, internal communications, compensations and benefits, personnel records, participation in salary reviews process, corporate culture building).
